channel.title: How to edit clients?
channel.description: hey, im new to this but, im making a client for l-scape, well trying, how do i edit the client to mkae it say what i want it to, and change the ip address to ours.

item.title: How to edit clients?
item.dc:creator: @Rmds90 Rmds90
item.description:
@Rmds90 wrote:

There are several tutorials on the section below this one. But still, ill help you. To change your background its usually stored in “spirtes” folder. You need a client thats editable, if you only have 3 things in your client then you can’t change it. All the other things such as IP address and client name are stored under “client” in your folder. Then just simply do ctrl + F to find the thing thats already there and then replace it for what you want. If you want this in more detail then i suggest you go to the section “moparscape client hacking” where they have tutorials on how to edit a client.

Read full topic
